name: Zeplin Dark Mode
description: Dark mode for Web version of Zeplin so your eyes don't completely burn while you look at projects for 8 hours a day.
additional_info:
⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️
⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️
 YOU NEED TO MANUALLY DELETE TWO LINES FOR FULL FUNCTIONALITY
⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️
⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️

- After installing the style (or updating it), you can then edit it.
- Click the plugin -> My Styles -> pen icon when you hover over "Zeplin Dark Mode", and completely remove both of the lines that say "DELETE THIS LINE"
- All done! :)
